Uses of Interface
com.complexible.common.memory.MemoryPool

  • Packages that use MemoryPool 
    Package Description
    com.complexible.common.memory  
    com.complexible.common.memory.buffer  

    • Uses of MemoryPool in com.complexible.common.memory

      Methods in com.complexible.common.memory that return MemoryPool 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MemoryPool MemoryPools.bounded(long theSize)
      Create a MemoryPool which has the specified hard limit on the amount of memory which can be allocated.
      static MemoryPool MemoryPools.empty()
      Return an empty MemoryPool
      MemoryPool MemoryPool.slice(long theSize)
      Create a child pool of the given size.
      static MemoryPool MemoryPools.system()
      Return the system MemoryPool; a bounded pool which contains the amount of memory specified by -XX:MaxDirectMemory, or when not specified, the default max directory memory allowed by the JVM.
      static MemoryPool MemoryPools.systemChild()
